meanings.definition: Accurate or precise in every detail
meanings.sent1: She gave an exact answer to the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The tailor made sure the measurements were exact for the dress.
meanings.sent3: The chef's exact measurements of ingredients made the cake taste perfect.
meanings.sent4: His exact memory of the event amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The detective's exact observations solved the mystery.

meanings.definition: To demand and obtain by force or authority

meanings.sent2: The king wanted to exact tribute from the conquered lands.
meanings.sent3: The villain tried to exact revenge on the hero.
meanings.sent4: The dictator sought to exact obedience from the citizens.
meanings.sent5: The bully tried to exact lunch money from the younger kids.
